mapper.select: SELECT R.RESERVE_NO, R.RESERVE_DATE, L.COMPANY, M.ROOM_NAME, EXTRACT( DAY FROM R.CHECKOUT-R.CHECKIN) AS CHECKDATE, R.RESERVE_PRICE, R.RESERVE_STATE FROM RESERVATION R JOIN LODGMENT L ON R.LODGMENT_NO = L.LODGMENT_NO JOIN ROOM M ON M.ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_NO JOIN MEMBER F ON F.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO WHERE F.MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} ORDER BY R.RESERVE_DATE DESC
SELECT R.RESERVE_POINTS, R.CHECKOUT, M.MEMBER_POINT FROM MEMBER M JOIN RESERVATION R ON M.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}

SELECT L.COMPANY, R.ROOM_NAME, R.ROOM_PRICE FROM ROOM R JOIN LODGMENT L ON R.LODGMENT_NO = L.LODGMENT_NO JOIN RESERVATION A ON L.LODGMENT_NO = A.LODGMENT_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON A.RESERVE_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
